---
title: "Evaluating Diagnostic Classification Models"
---

This session how to evaluate diagnostic classification models with [Stan](https://mc-stan.org) using the R package [measr](https://measr.info).
We cover absolute and relative model fit, item-level fit, and reliability indices.
